name: Vektor ND Grand Wyrm
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Energy Redistribution Unit drops in Alien Playfields and can be used for various tradeskill processes. #L "Energy Redistribution Unit" "257961" #L "Vektor ND DRAGON Shotgun" "124262" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Energy Redistribution Unit + Vektor ND DRAGON Shotgun = #L "Vektor ND Grand Wyrm" "257123"
